programme.title: Dia Yang Kau Pilih
programme.desc: Kinara, a kind-hearted girl who is the backbone of her family. Maura, Kinara's younger sister, never wants to help and has ambitions to marry a rich man so she can live a luxurious life. Kinara gets a job at Dafa's company. Working together often causes Dafa and Kirana to fall in love. Knowing this, Maura wants to steal Dafa away.

programme.title: Cinta Adik Ipar Tidak Maut Tapi Akut
programme.desc: Febi (Raisya Bawazier) lives with her older sister. However, her sister thinks that Febi is her deadly sister-in-law. Her sister does not know that Febi is in love with her cousin-in-law, Edgar (Dylan Carr). How will the story unfold?

programme.title: Jika Harimu Berat Ngopi Dulu Bolo
programme.desc: Ranti (Larasati Nugroho) is a hard worker and always cheerful in her daily life. Ranti then accidentally bumps into a handsome man named Rain (Cakrawala Airawan). It is said that Rain was rushing to catch up with time, carrying a ring to propose to his beloved named Vivi on that day. Rain lost the ring due to the collision or incident with the beautiful coffee seller, Ranti.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S3
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. Initially, Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, accidentally the horse that Maudy was riding went berserk until it fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Dia Yang Kau Pilih
programme.desc: Kinara, a kind-hearted girl who is the backbone of her family. Working together often causes Dafa and Kirana to fall in love. Knowing this, Maura wants to steal Dafa away.

programme.title: Maling Hati Malah Kena Ulti
programme.desc: The driver named Trisno (Ridho Illahi) was shocked by Fafa's (Djihan Ranti) actions. Then, Fafa, who was at fault, instead of apologizing, blamed Trisno. Some time later, Fafa and Trisno met again. Fafa finally found out that Trisno was the man who looked after her mother's goats. Not only that, Fafa also refused when her mother tried to arrange a marriage between Fafa and Trisno. This made Trisno

programme.title: Malam Kelam Tania
programme.desc: Tania (Asha Assuncao) meets Rey (Anrez Adelio) again, the man who helped her when she was returning home. Tania thinks Rey is a motorcycle taxi driver, when in fact he is a journalist working undercover. Several events bring Tania and Rey closer together. They develop feelings for each other, but an incident causes Tania to forget Rey.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S3
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. Initially, Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, accidentally the horse that Maudy was riding went berserk until it fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Seumuran Memang Berkelas Tapi Brondong Lebih Menggoda
programme.desc: Nathan (Alzi Markers) tries to approach Jamilah (Anjani Dina) with evil intentions inspired by his sister, Avril (Nadya Yasmin). However, Nathan ends up falling in love with Jamilah. Jamilah eventually finds out that Nathan was only pretending to approach her for the recipe. What happens next? Watch the full story only on SCTV's FTV - “Seumuran Memang Berkelas Tapi Brondong Lebih Menggoda.”.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S1
programme.desc: Love After Love tells the story of a family that appears perfect but hides a heartbreaking secret. Feeling lucky to have a husband like Niko, a successful businessman, and a daughter, Audrey, Starla must now swallow the bitterness of Niko's affair with their mutual school friend, Ayu.

programme.title: Bulan Terbelah di Hati Mas Silver
programme.desc: Fikri, the Silver Man Who Fell in Love with the Moon, a Beautiful Satpoll PP Officer. They Met Very Often. One day, while the Moon was on duty, she caught Fikri.

programme.title: Seumuran Memang Berkelas Tapi Brondong Lebih Menggoda
programme.desc: Nathan (Alzi Markers) tries to approach Jamilah (Anjani Dina) with evil intentions inspired by his sister, Avril (Nadya Yasmin). However, Nathan ends up falling in love with Jamilah. programme.title: Naura: Suara Dari Mas Kambing
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Naura (Ina Marika) seems to possess magical powers. Whatever she swears will come true. However, it appears that her magical powers suddenly disappear when Naura falls in love with a goat herder named Satria (Rezca Syam).

programme.title: 33 Hari Aku Terjebak Rekayasa Cintamu
programme.desc: Raisa was supposed to marry Bayu, but ran away after finding out that Bayu had reported Hari to the police. Raisa and Hari met again. At first, Hari approached her with the intention of taking revenge on Bayu, but eventually they fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S3
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. programme.title: Biarin Gembul Yang Penting Manisnya Pas
programme.desc: Nita is often bullied by her college friends, especially Sarah because of her fat physique. However, the Assistant Lecturer named Arya always defends and protects Nita. Arya always remembered her childhood friend named Tata, since meeting Nita Arya, she remembered her childhood friend and tried to find her.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S1
programme.desc: Love After Love tells the story of a family that appears perfect but hides a heartbreaking secret. Feeling lucky to have a husband like Niko, a successful businessman, and a daughter, Audrey, Starla must now swallow the bitterness of Niko's affair with their mutual school friend, Ayu.

programme.title: Pacarannya Sama Aku, Nikahnya Sama Dia Chuaks!
programme.desc: Dito wants to marry Riska, but Riska keeps avoiding him and even cheats on him with Rendy. Dito meets Dea, who is also involved in arranging her client's wedding. Will Dea and Dito fall in love with each other?
